feed.title: Ampache Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ampache: 7.1.1
entry.content:
7.1.1

php8.4 7d71b4ecf070a31a9fa5f119cbbc1c65 ./ampache-7.1.1_all_php8.4.zip 765ae67da1204bfa5dcd656dbe151708 ./ampache-7.1.1_all_squashed_php8.4.zip 9c16fa7ec18b677cb6943463657514bb ./ampache-7.1.1_all_client_php8.4.zip

php8.3 f7b0c11092ba77406cf8f455145e1608 ./ampache-7.1.1_all_php8.3.zip 3581df0b3dbf75f010de8def6d2f192d ./ampache-7.1.1_all_squashed_php8.3.zip 152869510f93c00de215c742c90fdab9 ./ampache-7.1.1_all_client_php8.3.zip

php8.2 e6308f2258f553e1808b839305e1da61 ./ampache-7.1.1_all_php8.2.zip 3da7813860d27ba4794df0d1efd3e2c5 ./ampache-7.1.1_all_squashed_php8.2.zip 7288cd2545e14104890a91f8e5048fdf ./ampache-7.1.1_all_client_php8.2.zip

UNSUPPORTED Code only release. (Requires composer install) 9cc93e644540be1e5648688a85d44226 ./ampache-7.1.1_public.zip f61dc05491722e2cd5c263381db69c93 ./ampache-7.1.1_squashed.zip 489b575274d181389533e9680515beeb ./ampache-7.1.1_client.zip

Ampache 7.1.1

This quick point release covers 2 specific issues. checkout out 7.1.0 here for a larger view of the changes since 7.0.1

If you allow user uploads or make extensive use of the CLI command export:playlist then this release is for you.

By fixing an issue with licenses I've found that the POST array wasn't being included correctly in the uploads.

The export:playlist command was not correctly grabbing all the playlists when you export without a user id (--user / -u)

If you're on 7.1.0 and aren't affect by these issues then you can safely ignore this release.

Fixed

  • Upload POST array not sending license correctly to filepond
  • CLI
  • export:playlist: Documentation for type listed as mandatory
  • export:playlist: User id would not export all playlists when using System account
  • Error checking REMOTE_ADDR for web URLs (CLI commands will user fallback_url when required)

API

NO CHANGE

Zip Version information

If you aren't familiar which the project make sure you know which zip you need to download.

entry.title: New release for Ampache: 6.6.6
entry.content:
6.6.6

php8.3 28f38c20a07dc3a6036b098cc02330ad ./ampache-6.6.6_all_php8.3.zip 97dc9b1f9e9f74a04cf09c96049984ac ./ampache-6.6.6_all_squashed_php8.3.zip

php8.2 6b97229677cc1760f870adf17f0206ad ./ampache-6.6.6_all_php8.2.zip e68ab777d42d3e5604e4b8b39dc4074e ./ampache-6.6.6_all_squashed_php8.2.zip

php8.1 1cee3895732a6665c440f096f1819f9b ./ampache-6.6.6_all_php8.1.zip aa57bbda49296e2f66bd10345a04bd81 ./ampache-6.6.6_all_squashed_php8.1.zip

php8.0 5cc2b412baac0190fc47e5ccdc8930a0 ./ampache-6.6.6_all_php8.0.zip a9eef8bb9d69e05a1130174ab6173cf4 ./ampache-6.6.6_all_squashed_php8.0.zip

UNSUPPORTED php7.4 (will be built until it can't be done any more) 6921a4db35975e7db081457a46f71a59 ./ampache-6.6.6_all_php7.4.zip 2c5b2a0572483cb20588778e7985e095 ./ampache-6.6.6_all_squashed_php7.4.zip

UNSUPPORTED Code only release. (Requires composer install) 9f0211ec8125ea1eeb5ed7853fc734a5 ./ampache-6.6.6_public.zip 43eeefa576259d1cadee30262f6f570f ./ampache-6.6.6_squashed.zip

Ampache 6.6.6

Added

  • Database downgrades up to Ampache 7.2.0

Fixed

  • Sending a string to createBrowse where int|null is required
  • Simplify DB update 600073 to avoid possible issues with empty playlists
  • Search
  • Searching Podcast Episode by state would not reload after the results are loaded

API 6.6.6

Merge update from Ampache7.

Fixed

  • ALL
  • Not checking auth on User lookup

entry.title: New release for Ampache: 7.2.0
entry.content:
7.2.0

php8.4 3aacd40265241096e5e9e6c794e90710 ./ampache-7.2.0_all_php8.4.zip 23241107fd9629a6662dc91a81bded28 ./ampache-7.2.0_all_squashed_php8.4.zip f9581d7529a9006dd5dae81cc7cdd3da ./ampache-7.2.0_all_client_php8.4.zip

php8.3 bdabf2cb0a8801158ff52b2a98e28d38 ./ampache-7.2.0_all_php8.3.zip dad33ca26a1faceaace912a2221b11a2 ./ampache-7.2.0_all_squashed_php8.3.zip 5ff1986991e6c66036b4c0b09ea6ac96 ./ampache-7.2.0_all_client_php8.3.zip

php8.2 b05c4c328194c460e78aa6d1288c754c ./ampache-7.2.0_all_php8.2.zip d249a99b3d53bf28c79ac3d261fbc813 ./ampache-7.2.0_all_squashed_php8.2.zip 61f7e9dd4472822aa0844e4d5a15c1c9 ./ampache-7.2.0_all_client_php8.2.zip

UNSUPPORTED Code only release. (Requires composer install) afb3f59e0b49a7ba2f3c5cf727c8b374 ./ampache-7.2.0_public.zip b041f11c050d8cd5af97d640acf5cef3 ./ampache-7.2.0_squashed.zip c61ed381b253de5972e162cb90b09fa7 ./ampache-7.2.0_client.zip

Ampache 7.2.0

Added

  • Add npm audit to GitHub QA workflow
  • Assign a HTML id to input text on inline loaded input
  • Add [No Genre] as the first genre on the browse pages
  • Browse
  • Add no_genre to Song, Album, AlbumDisk, Artist, Song and Video browses
  • Search
  • Add album_count, artist_count, song_count and video_count to Genre search
  • Database 720001
  • Add artist, album, song and video counts to the tag table
  • Update object_type to an enum on the tag_map table

Changed

  • Updated NPM and Composer packages
  • Invalidate default theme CSS cache on new Ampache versions

Fixed

  • Show all catalogs in show catalogs page correctly
  • Missing album_id in upload process function
  • Custom Artist and Album names for filepond uploads
  • Typo on user pages loading recently played
  • Sending a string to createBrowse where int|null is required
  • Rector updates for function name case and other minor issues
  • Set empty album and album_disk properties on bad songs
  • Simplify DB update 700005 to avoid possible issues with empty playlists
  • Import user ratings correctly for vorbiscomment (flac) files
  • Include disksubtitle in more AlbumDisk import and update areas
  • Search
  • Searching Podcast Episode by state would not reload after the results are loaded

API 6.6.6

Fixed

  • ALL
  • Not checking auth on User lookup

Zip Version information

If you aren't familiar which the project make sure you know which zip you need to download.

entry.title: New release for Ampache: 6.6.7
entry.content:
6.6.7

php8.3 380455d9a2f0525a9fb0a53dd65b1d39 ./ampache-6.6.7_all_php8.3.zip 3821e32ad1a5340a45cd44778505ff27 ./ampache-6.6.7_all_squashed_php8.3.zip

php8.2 d39aafb26cb33263d3642912265a22ca ./ampache-6.6.7_all_php8.2.zip 6654ba5ffc173b7417555c2401ae4287 ./ampache-6.6.7_all_squashed_php8.2.zip

php8.1 48292220969a965c8a217d23b088f63b ./ampache-6.6.7_all_php8.1.zip ab35b91bd33f1690458514f693faaf54 ./ampache-6.6.7_all_squashed_php8.1.zip

php8.0 ca431327903664ff2ab33ae53ee5b464 ./ampache-6.6.7_all_php8.0.zip b452575f3b06aea8bbc2d58bef767efb ./ampache-6.6.7_all_squashed_php8.0.zip

UNSUPPORTED php7.4 (will be built until it can't be done any more) c2c5be645d7e8aa8227b1ba7efdd6386 ./ampache-6.6.7_all_php7.4.zip 6327f3664c1e7065cd74d1f8c4cc0f5a ./ampache-6.6.7_all_squashed_php7.4.zip

UNSUPPORTED Code only release. (Requires composer install) 3b8eb515186b71eb8a0405b06d5fd158 ./ampache-6.6.7_public.zip d127bfebee9baaff54d66dc9f2487334 ./ampache-6.6.7_squashed.zip

Ampache 6.6.7

Update to include a lot of new search options and bug fixes from Ampache7

Added

  • Database downgrades up to Ampache 7.3.0
  • Search
  • Debug warnings on searches with no rules
  • Add waveform to song search. (Must not enable album_art_store_disk to return data)
  • Add album_count, artist_count, song_count and video_count to Genre search
  • Add disk_count to Album & AlbumDisk search types
  • Add no_license to Song search
  • Add skipped_times and played_or_skipped_times to Album, AlbumDisk and Artist searches
  • Add myplayed_times to Album, AlbumDisk, Artist, PodcastEpisode, Podcast and Song searches
  • Add myskipped_times to Album, AlbumDisk, Artist, PodcastEpisode, Podcast and Song searches
  • Add myplayed_or_skipped_times to Album, AlbumDisk, Artist, PodcastEpisode, Podcast and Song searches
  • Add none to Song search (Empty rule/no filter)
  • Add genre_count_song, genre_count_album and genre_count_artist to Song search
  • Add genre_count_song, genre_count_album and genre_count_artist to Album search
  • Add genre_count_song, genre_count_album and genre_count_artist to AlbumDisk search
  • Add genre_count_song, genre_count_album and genre_count_artist to Artist search

Fixed

  • PodcastEpisode loading errors for new files that aren't downloaded yet
  • Search
  • Album and AlbumDisk parameter not included for release_type, release_status, barcode and catalog_number searches
  • Average rating searches for null values
  • Ratings for AlbumDisk objects not searched
  • webplayer
  • Not escaping bad characters correctly

API 6.6.7

Changed

  • ALL
  • stats: Allow limit -1 for no limit. (0 falls back to popular_threshold value)

entry.title: New release for Ampache: 7.3.0
entry.content:
7.3.0

php8.4 2090be07ac57186d4a699745abd52272 ./ampache-7.3.0_all_php8.4.zip f608f90f4d446088828af8df9d21ce2a ./ampache-7.3.0_all_php8.4_squashed.zip a7426310b2c8da2e361fb93bc9211946 ./ampache-7.3.0_all_php8.4_client.zip

php8.3 e66860583b1c44b5085060a87714f5a5 ./ampache-7.3.0_all_php8.3.zip 6a929aafa08cd6d0ebdc676817906832 ./ampache-7.3.0_all_php8.3_squashed.zip 40ce86b8353635065e17428e291da140 ./ampache-7.3.0_all_php8.3_client.zip

php8.2 9a902400ea23a2cb636972297630cbb8 ./ampache-7.3.0_all_php8.2.zip ec4fc62cd27d8105279fea1e0490b098 ./ampache-7.3.0_all_php8.2_squashed.zip 40e99ac7a6f0c245798febcca041f600 ./ampache-7.3.0_all_php8.2_client.zip

UNSUPPORTED Code only release. (Requires composer and npm install) 5b94d1ab3757e023400f24659d0b26c4 ./ampache-7.3.0_public.zip 428eb73fc6aa1295c8ebdeedc102ede8 ./ampache-7.3.0_squashed.zip bdef8a8caf5596bf38bce283d6ee9b8b ./ampache-7.3.0_client.zip

Ampache 7.3.0

This update has a lot of updates for verification and tag updates.

The biggest update though is the performance increase!

Many formatting and simple properties have been removed speeding up object actions.

Pre-translating files before loading media templates should speed those pages up a bit too.

NOTE Zip names for squashed and client releases have changed to put the structure at the end of the filename so the defaults are shown first. (e.g. default release for php8.4 ./ampache-7.3.0_all_php8.4.zip)

Added

  • Translations 2025-02-14
  • Added option to show separate Artist column for playlist media
  • Pre-translate common strings on repeated tasks before loading media row templates
  • Clean empty albums after each verify chunk
  • Add memory_get_peak_usage to query stat output
  • Add .htaccess.dist to the web root. (Block obviously bad parameters)
  • HTML link on Share list
  • New catalog Auto-insert Fields
  • %B Album Artist
  • %m Song Artist AND Album Artist
  • Search
  • Add genre_count_song, genre_count_album and genre_count_artist to Song search
  • Add genre_count_song, genre_count_album and genre_count_artist to Album search
  • Add genre_count_song, genre_count_album and genre_count_artist to AlbumDisk search
  • Add genre_count_song, genre_count_album and genre_count_artist to Artist search
  • Database 721001
  • Add user preference to show/hide the Artist column on playlist media

Changed

  • Update NPM vite package
  • Update table counts for album and artist objects on update
  • Clean up empty albums during migration
  • Rework catalog_map insert and remove during file updates
  • Only collect garbage maps for the catalog media type used
  • Make sure mail server or user_no_email_confirm is set to show registration pages
  • Don't show now playing when it's not in a catalog you can play
  • Block access to media outside your catalog access if you have a direct link
  • Don't check Album song catalog when you've already checked the Album
  • Don't execute format the object for row display pages
  • Don't show share URL if it's expired
  • Easy Captcha id generation using random string instead of SERVER_NAME

Removed

  • Don't check file modification time on verify. Just use the database last_update value
  • Remove useless and low use properties on classes and replace with functions or direct calls
  • Video catalog auto-insert fields %S, %n and %e

Fixed

  • Rate every instance of star ratings for the object instead of the first one found
  • Don't show query error on duplicate stream session
  • RSS generation without SCRIPT_URI
  • Building Song cache didn't include album_disk column
  • Don't check tag case changes for genres
  • Remove hidden tags from the tag_map table and do not delete them from the tag table
  • Update parent tag lists when change occurred on verify
  • Don't put string tags in the int list for comparison
  • Speed up catalog_map delete queries for 'artist' type
  • Don't unset object properties during tag change comparison
  • Error with database properties that allow null values
  • Require mail config or user_no_email_confirm to allow registration
  • PodcastEpisode loading errors for new files that aren't downloaded yet
  • NPM copyfile commands missing prettyPhoto files
  • External auth avatar update when enabled was not checking for blankuser.png urls
  • Don't cache song_data table from single column requests
  • Don't insert empty strings for null data in song_data
  • SERVER_NAME may not be set for Captcha
  • webplayer
  • Not escaping bad characters correctly
  • Not blocking playback for media when catalog disabled or hidden from user with direct link
  • CLI
  • Hide invalid default command values. (e.g. Verbose and Version are not required)
  • Search
  • Album and AlbumDisk parameter not included for release_type, release_status, barcode and catalog_number searches
  • Song searches for favorites (e.g. my_flagged_song) sql error
  • SubSonic
  • OpenSubsonic extention (openSubsonicExtensions) incorrect case
  • Catch empty LocalPlay controller when disabled
  • Plugins
  • HomeDashboard would not correctly get random AlbumDisk objects

API 6.6.7

Changed

  • ALL
  • stats: Allow limit -1 for no limit. (0 falls back to popular_threshold value)

Zip Version information

If you aren't familiar which the project make sure you know which zip you need to download.
